tool_description: Solves Image Captcha Using Service. Accuracy depends on the captcha type and level of difficulty. Use the Basic version and check if this suits your requirements.

api_list.name: Create Image Captcha Request
api_list.description: Creates a request to solve Image Captcha. Takes base64 image as input.

required_parameters.name: base64image
required_parameters.description: The base64 encoded image of the captcha to be solved.
